headline: Eli Lilly (LLY) Profit Growth Surges 120%, Reinforcing Bullish Narrative Despite Premium Valuation
summary: Eli Lilly (LLY) delivered standout results, with earnings climbing at a 20% annual pace over the past five years and surging 120% in the last year alone. Net profit margins rose to 31% versus 20.5% a year ago. Looking ahead, earnings are forecast to grow at 19.3% per year, outpacing the broader US market's 15.9% estimate. Despite a lofty Price-to-Earnings ratio of 42 times, which sits well above industry norms, the current share price of $862.86 still trails a discounted cash flow fair value...
